app_descript:
App Name: WannaDraw

Brief: WannaDraw is an inspirational app designed for artists and drawing enthusiasts looking for a daily dose of creativity. As a relaunch of the original WannaDraw application, it assures users that it remains a safe space, never requesting personal information or money. The app serves as a random drawing generator, offering a vast array of over 15,000 different combination possibilities for sketch prompts, ensuring that artists can find new inspiration every day.
